author: Fiona Denton
description:
Do you have a bookish friend whom you are sure you would like the recommendations from? Luckily for me, as part of the Grimdark Magazine review team, I have many like-minded friends with excellent reading suggestions. Through one of their recommendations, I picked up The Gilded Crown, a debut dark fantasy novel by Marianne Gordon. […]

The post REVIEW: The Gilded Crown by Marianne Gordon appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Gilded Crown by Marianne Gordon
